sentences.sContent: What we intend to halt, by any means, is three centuries of spoliation of this earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: What we intend to halt, by any means, is three centuries of spoliation of this earth.
sentences.sCn: 我们所要做的，就是用任何方法，阻止三个世纪以来对这个地球所进得的掠夺。

remMethod.val: 来自spoliate(v. 强夺， 抢劫)

trans.tranOther: the act or an instance of despoiling or plundering
